com.bytelightning.opensource.pokerface

Class DirectoryWatchService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bytelightning.opensource.pokerface.DirectoryWatchService

  • public class DirectoryWatchService
extends Object
    This class is a GOF Bridge pattern to decouple file watching from the underlying technology used to 'watch' a given directory for changes. Could use something like JNotify, but currently uses JDK 7.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Map<WatchKey,Path> keys 
      protected Map<Path,DirectoryWatchEventListener> listeners 
      protected WatchService watcher

                      throws IOException

      • cancelWatch

        public boolean cancelWatch(Object token)
        Cancel a previously established watch
        Parameters:
        token - Value returned from establishWatch
        Returns:
        True if the watch existed and was successfully canceled.
